word: AS WELL MIGHT MEN EXPECT TO GATHER "GRAPES OF THORNS, OR FIGS OF THISTLES," AS TO FIND UNADULTERATED TRUTH AND SANCTIFYING POWER EMANATING FROM A BASE DECEIVER. "EVERY GOOD TREE BRINGETH FORTH GOOD FRUIT; BUT A CORRUPT TREE BRINGETH FORTH EVIL FRUIT. A GOOD TREE CANNOT BRING FORTH EVIL FRUIT, NEITHER CAN A CORRUPT TREE BRING FORTH GOOD FRUIT. . . . WHEREFORE BY THEIR FRUITS YE SHALL KNOW THEM." MATTHEW 7:15-20.
